marytts.signalproc.adaptation.gmm.jointgmm
Class JointGMMTransformer

java.lang.Object
  marytts.signalproc.adaptation.BaselineTransformer
      marytts.signalproc.adaptation.gmm.jointgmm.JointGMMTransformer

public class JointGMMTransformer
extends BaselineTransformer

Voice conversion transformation using Joint-GMM approach. Reference: A. Kain and M. Macon, “Spectral voice conversion for text-to-speech synthesis,” in Proc. of the IEEE ICASSP 1998, vol. 1, pp. 285-288.

Author:
Oytun Türk
